mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO resume VALUES(#{r_code} , #{m_code}, #{title}, #{content}, #{address}, #{education}, #{license}) INTO resume_file VALUES(#{r_code}, #{file_name}) SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT r.r_code, r.m_code, r.title, r.content, r.address, r.education, r.license, f.r_code, f.file_name, sum(w.late_status) as late_status, count(w.late_status)-sum(w.late_status) as c_late_status FROM resume r, resume_file f, work_record w WHERE r.r_code = f.r_code AND r.r_code = #{r_code} group by r.r_code, r.m_code, r.title, r.content, r.address, r.education, r.license, f.r_code, f.file_name

SELECT sum(w.late_status) as late_status, count(w.late_status)-sum(w.late_status) as c_late_status FROM resume r, work_record w, resume_file f WHERE r.r_code = #{r_code} AND substr(r.r_code,1,INSTR(r.r_code,'/')-1) = substr(w.sa_code,1,INSTR(w.sa_code,'/')-1) group by r.r_code, r.m_code, r.title, r.content, r.address, r.education, r.license, f.r_code, f.file_name
SELECT SUBSTR(r.r_code,INSTR(r.r_code,'/')+1, 10) r_date, r.m_code, r.title, r.content, r.address, r.r_code, n.n_code FROM resume r, notice_apply n WHERE r.r_code = n.r_code AND n.n_code = #{n_code}
SELECT n.title, n.n_code, na.r_code FROM notice_apply na, notice n WHERE na.n_code = n.n_code AND SUBSTR(na.r_code,0, INSTR(na.r_code, '/')-1) = #{id}
